tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Surveillance (
    surveillance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    image_id INT,
    video_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (drone_id) REFERENCES Drones(drone_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES Images(image_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (video_id) REFERENCES Videos(video_id)
);
